misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a familiar face at St. Laurence Golf, is known as much for his spirited play as he is for the ever-present drink in his hand. His relaxed demeanor belies a fierce competitive spirit, making him a formidable opponent in any setting.

With nine past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Martin's experience is undeniable. His knowledge of the course and the nuances of the game is a significant advantage. His fans are thrilled to know that Martin will be playing in Hector Trophée 2025, which will be his tenth appearance.

To date, Martin has secured the coveted Hector Trophée once, in addition to one Victor Trophy. These achievements are a testament to his skill and dedication. His fellow competitors know that Martin is always a threat to win.

Off the course, Martin is a charismatic figure, always ready with a story or a joke. However, when he steps onto the tee, his focus sharpens, and his determination becomes clear. Martin is a true sportsman, embodying the spirit of the game both on and off the course.
